title: Virgin Guy Next Door
description: A Curvy Girl and Virgin Guy Next Door Romantic ComedyWith a podcast dedicated to sex and a virgin guy next door…what’s a girl to do?THE INEXPERIENCED BACHELOR series are short, sweet, and steamy standalone romantic comedies about curvy women who fall for hot virgin guys. No cheating. No cliffhangers. HEA guaranteed.
author: Lana Dash
